content.title: Type B Dissection Presentation
content.definition: Acute onset back pain, hypertension. Complicated if malperfusion, rupture, uncontrolled pain/HTN, or rapid expansion.
content.statement: Type B Dissection Presentation is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Aortic-Dissection that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.
